replace:
$0

<xf:if is="($thread.isInsert() AND !$thread.Forum.laneros_portal_auto_feature AND $thread.canFeatureUnfeature())
	OR ($thread.isUpdate() && $thread.canFeatureUnfeature())"
>
	<xf:textboxrow name="featured_title"
				   value="{$thread.FeaturedThread.featured_title}" 
				   maxlength="{{ max_length($thread, 'title') }}"
				   placeholder="{{ phrase('title...') }}"
				   label="{{ phrase('laneros_portal_featured_title') }}" />
	
	<xf:textarearow name="snippet" autosize="true"
				value="{$thread.FeaturedThread.snippet}" 
				maxlength="{{ $xf.options.lanerosPortalSnippet.enabled ? $xf.options.lanerosPortalSnippet.length : null }}"
				label="{{ phrase('laneros_portal_snippet') }}"
				hint="{{ phrase('laneros_portal_snippet_hint', { 'length': $xf.options.lanerosPortalSnippet.length }) }}"
				explain="{{ phrase('laneros_portal_snippet_explain') }}" />
</xf:if>
